input.sentences: we took this picture in the inn we were staying while on our trip .
we saw a few castles | but did n't tour any of them .
we went to a historical church with relics one day .
the inn had a really comfortable balcony ; sometimes i napped there .
the sunsets could not have been more beautiful .
output.sentences: On this trip we stayed at an amazing hotel.
We had to tour this castle.
Inside were some of the best historical relics still in tact.
After walking for hours we went back to our inn and took a nap
The sunsets from our hotel room were beautiful.
